twitch_info.title: I wanna take the timemachine 2 - Lunatic - Casual
twitch_info.description: Despite a 6+ month break period, beating the game in around 6 hours was an astonishing result.

message.body: man is this the new Secret 6 kamilia added?
just playing some lunatic cause tokoroten ain't making progress
I'm usually much better than this but
can chalk it up to long day LUL
I think what happened with Tokoroten
was I got too tired for corners
was unable to progress after reaching final once
some of the hardest needle in timemachine 2
primarily this save is heavily affected by valign tho
and ye I've done luantic many times before, I've taken a break from tokoroten for now cause not awakee nough
valign makes all the difference to that save
It looks like the character is to big for the parcourse
ye due to it being timemachine 2 on l unatic mode it's a lot tougher
character ssize in timemachine 2 is always the same tho
you are doing this freaking awesome
I reached final in tokrooten once but
got too tired for its corners attack
imo tokoroten attacks are on crack
dont know how to even predict some of the attacks
if you were looking for tokoroten, I'll be continuing that tomorrow xd
is this the stage of that one funny save
but I know how to do that save
naa found you on speedrun com and it said you where speedrunning i wanne be the guy :P
there is a way to do this btw
is the use of the shift releasing mechanic
Basically, if you hold shift longer than you think you should then let go
normally I get the save very quickly but it is what it is
its like a pixel or 2 wrong each time
shift releasing mechanics make that funny save much easier
and you have to use shift releasing
Someone could grind it for hours
and then accidentally do shift releasing and win
without ever knowing why they won
that was me at one point
also did a sneaky shift releasing for last save to make it easer just then LUL
reason I can play lunatic casuallyike this is I've played it for years LUL
that long jump at the end there
without shift releasing it's basically some crazy v-string nonsense
I used to gind that downward climb really hard
this one is some awkward v-string
only 2 minutes off my best huh
I plan to try and get the timemachine 2 lunatic wr
failing to pull the speedrun trick is monka
world 2 & 5 are the hardest lunatic worlds
so these deaths all make sense
took me 6 hours back in the day
it's that final jump that does it
everyone takes ages on this save
cleaarly this is a save you don't weant to be out of practice on
I dunno if I can beat this save tonight
this valign does make a difference lmao
grabbing that unstable valign saved me
and then I failed the seutp
this game acts a bit weirdly if you hold shift
and if you let go at the right timing with shift release you get an awkward boost
so my strat combines the two
and it means I can always hit the question mark block
and then it's just a perfect double jump back and you've won
If you try and do that without that strat....
Let's just say it's p a i n
pitch black unless lightning strike skind of awful
and this save is a pain
and this is lunatic mode lmao
lunatic mode is a lot of fun if you're good but otherwise stay clear
lunatic has a lot of funnies shall we say
lunatic also ages like fine wine
it's not fun when you first play it, but every subsequent time it's better LUL
but ye it's a cool game on normal
final boss is a difficulty cliff tho
so watch out for that if you do play it
trying to figure out what inputs I'm getting wrong, this save is a nasty one
are those little blue things jump refreshers?
ah so you have to triple over the spikes
there's also orange ones of those things btw
and they're high jumps rather than refresher
but I don't recall them being used outside of world 2
in that case gonna eat my thing rq and then continue LUL
Either my shift inputs are too heavy or wrong platform character position I think
oh right it's similar to don't bonk isn't it
first tried all bosses so far surprisingly tho
with this speed tho I don't think luny eill take long
sorry about that, had no real break in like 6 hours LUL
just needed food that was all
I'm kididng, I hate it LUL
this save is one of the few that still remains bad
but if you want terrible saves
wait until an M jump save in world 5 act 1 lunatic
That save always makes me want to quit
struggling on this save is unusual
this sure brings me back a couple years
is that three hundred fourteen hour count accurate
yeah top right is total play time
there are like 2 games in existence i've put anywhere near that much time into
a lot more time than this probably
that kind of value proposition blows my mind
I think is at like 700 hours rn
someone just popped off on one of the secrets yesterday
I got all crystals, done all secrets etc
I'm on a 100% playthrough on K3 atm, and all I have left for 100% is the 7 bosses
been working really hard on tokoroten but it's so rng hell
i would be so into kamilia if it didn't have bosses lol
I'm the other way round lmao
It's the bosses that keep me going
the boss is like the dessert after your meal
where for me the meal is the main focus lol
lunatic timemachine 2 is mostly needle ngl
the needle is most of your play time
if medley games had a feature where you could hand the controller to your big brother and he would beat the bosses for you
whoever invented 'the level is obscured except for lightning flashes every once in a while' mechanic needs to be sent to a special level of hell
I use obs asmy game screen for it
and it's legal in runs so
to make it actually legal, I tone it down a lot so I get the 'barely see' effect
you're meant to be able to see slightly
but my monitor doesn't let me do that at all
it just bugs me that annoyance/visual obscuration is a mechanic at all
like how fun would it be to disarm a bomb but someone's throwing french fries and dust at your face the whole time
i keep seeing it so i figured someone must like it somewhere
my PB on tokrooten is final attack
oh the coins have a purpose?
i'm just straight up blown away by this game
like if this showed up on steam i would be impressed by it
the entire reason I got into IWBTG fangames
I didn't want to touch them
what is it that appealed to you so much?
the platforming, presentation and the graphics style being really good for something like this
and I dunno it has a really special vibe to it
this is one of those few fangames most people rate 10/10
physics engine is very different and
that means you can't go from this game to normal iwbtg fangames and be good
I had to relearn my skill LUL
seems similar to boshy in that way maybe
I can speedrun this lunatic btw, I'm just out of practice.
kinda been on K3 100% for so many months LUL
it's not over tho I am getting K3 100%
planning to stream more attempts on tokoroten tomorrow
I usually beat this act very fast btw
double diamond w/ lasers kinda intimidating ngl
though it looks nerfed a bit
a game straight up requiring a double diamond makes me balk but it seems good in context here
as it's either quoting directly from original context or is basically a needle game hallmark
some random medium difficulty needle just throwing in a double diamond would give mepause
i even feel iffy about 3/4s diamonds
if it appeared out of nowhere
it's like having a random upwards plane
you can do it, but you're gonna raise my eyebrows
if the game is designed to be hard
if a game is medium diff
timemachine 2 lunatic as a whole is a 90
it seems like a well rounded 90 tho
like it's not all concentrated in one skill area
world 5 is hardest because it's final
influka is the original creator of K3
Kamilia took over from influka for K3 tho
influka also went under the name influcca.
creator of original K3 made this game
also that drop you saw me just do
i wish i knew more fangame history
What I did was a gravity cancel technique
So, a couple things to explain here LUL
For some reason if you have a double jump remaining, and you hold up and down arrow keys.... Mashing shift has you drop without gravity applied.
but this was an example of where it is
This game is a bit weird with the jump system.
If you hold shift longer than you think you should, then release, you gain distance
That's actually why a save in world 2 act 1 lunatic is called the funny save and people used to not know how to do it but randomly cleared it
they used shift releasing to win and never knew
You could do that save for hours because you didn't know LUL
this one is not a very liked boss
serious metal slug vibes from this boss
metal slug wass the inspiration behind this fangame
metal slug is a banger franchise
this is one of the harder b osses
I first tried the other two
You saw me get stuck during that fight
it's ccause you can't move if you are duck shooting lmao
so I did a jump out
there is actually save you never want to take
it will cause you p a i n if you do
If you see that question mark on top right of screen
the theoretical limit of a timemachine 2 speedrun is around 50 minutes
doubt that will be broken any time soon
was afk, gg on the boss!
and I love this one xd
you may think but you go so far back if you die like I jsut did
oh no do not taske that save
If you do, doing that whole segment is frame perfect to finish
but yeah so what you saw me do there was a gigantic skip
whichc an only be done if you skip that one save
If you do that segment you end up with a frame perfect finish and it's awful
so ye I always skip it
one of my least favourite saves in the game now
I learnt that the hard way
spent 60 hours on a save and then a better keyboard did it in 5 minutes
this is one of the few saves I say "fuck you" to
final is hardest of this anyway
omg ID ID the ring first try
I think anynoe can see why
well okay other than final save in this act
subpixels, valign, pixel perfect align, 6 frame perfect inputs in a row
people used to say that save would prevent speedruns
I learnt how to do it more consistently
getting the right valign and doing the jump perfectly
Razzor called the final save of world 5 act 1 lunatic (what we're in now) "The King of Trash".
where I always think I'm blocked
but then I eventually make it
final save is also one of those LUL
this is the hardest save I've done all day
that jump is a real pain
really takes me back down memory lane
now the pixel perfect align, valign, subpixels and 6 frame perfect inputs
forgot how bad shuriken save is
my old keyboard made me take 60 hours on
that Ic an now do in 5minutes
it's impressive if you can 2f on command imo
i can do 3fs pretty reliably but that's only because it's the required length for fox's short hop in melee :v
that one jump at the end of this save is a forced 2f btw
that's why it annoys me when I don't get it
tell that to my old keyboard
my old keyboard forced me to play this save for 60 hours
my keyboard can't even do a 2f
just to get the 2f to happen once
I have a much better keyboard now
i kinda wanna get a hitbox/arcade setup for fangaming
being able to 2f well is kb dependent
it's skill as well for sure
but if your kb can't do it well rip
fun-fact, and that is the entire reason I bought this keyboard
funny how I did that for a while and then did other things
what kind of keyboard do you have?
Corsair K70 Mk.2 RGB Red Mechanical
I do actually need another kind of keyboard if I want to shift cancel but eh
but ye I originally got this keyboard just for timemachine 2 lunatic speedruns
but turned out it was super useful for all other iwbtg fangames
if i get a new keyboard or controller at any point in the future it'll be pretty exclusively for fangames
coming up on 10 hours, you're a beast :o
and yeah Max himself was like
"how can he just play and play and play"
the key to it is the rare half hour breaks
it's probably easier when you're having fun the whole time too
timemachine 2 luny is great, except for this final world lmao
my problem is i can only play needle for about an hour before wanting to make my own again
the bosses afterwards are great too
i hope i get to see the bosses
that modified m-gate looks rly hard
you get to see the bosses
If you hold up and down arrow key while in a ufo, the velocity increases CONSTANTLy
and at a super fast speed
that's just a straight up bug?
then let go of one of the keys
remembering how to dothe boss now
expect final boss claer tonight LUL
have all my spirit bomb energy
forgotten about those last two there
that was crazy close to first try
that wasn't even the hard part yet
the boss does some whacky shit at the end
see you aren'te xpected to have
+9 max upgraded gun by this point
so the idea of the boss second phase
is when low health and they start smoking
they start to alternate between regular attacks and screen upside down
once that starts you're in reverse controls when right side up but regullar whenupside down
the idea is you'll shit ton ofs upside down attacks
gets to do very little upside down attacks
if you hve max upgraded pistol y'see
I haven't played all of lunatic in like a year
so the fact I got here today is astounding
gonna eat smth rq and then do some more attempts on finishing le boss
playing through all of timemachine 2 lunatic so quickly after like a year break
of why I did all of this in the first place
I beat timemachine 2 lunatic in one session after 6 months or more away from the game.
11 hour end, started at like 4 hours.
Looks like it took me 7 hours
Have a good night folks! :D o/
Can't believe I beat lunatic in 7 hours after taking a 6+ month break away.
